attachments.title: Adidas Departs from 3D Printed Design with Help From Carbon's Digital Light Synthesis - Core77
attachments.text: Late last night, adidas unveiled their game-changing version of digitally fabricated shoes in partnership with tech company, Carbon. The Futurecraft 4D running shoes combine Carbon's Digital Light Synthesis manufacturing process with footwear design knowledge from adidas' Futurecraft team. The result? A sleek sneaker that's way more complicated than it appears:
attachments.fallback: Core77: Adidas Departs from 3D Printed Design with Help From Carbon's Digital Light Synthesis - Core77
